name: InfraSight Labs
tag_list: virtualization, cloud-computing, monitoring, security, it-management, audit
overview:
InfraSight Labs develops software and services that provide confidence and insight into virtual and physical IT-infrastructures, so that organizations successfully can leverage the benefits from server-virtualization while bridging over new difficulties and security concerns.

InfraSight Labs mission is to provide products that guide companies to successful server-virtualization and cloud computing. This is done through presenting complex structures in understandable ways.

Our products collect data from several sources and make cross-connections and analyzes to compile a comprehensive overview, presented like no other single system. They are vital tools for IT technicians and managers so that they easily can see and understand what their environment really looks like. This is powerful in fast changing structures where conditions constantly change.

Our products visualize IT infrastructures in many ways and create up-to-date and accurate documentation on the spot.

Moreover, our unique IT infrastructure modeling approach help automatically analyze and simulate changes in infrastructures to assure that they are always compliant towards practices, regulations and companies’ policies.
